import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; export default function Header({ onSelectedTopicChange, onSelectedQuestionChange, }) { const [currentDate, setCurrentDate] = useState(new Date()); const [searchTopic, setSearchTopic] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { const timer = setInterval(() => { setCurrentDate(new Date()); }, 1000); // Update the date and time every second return () => clearInterval(timer); // Clear the interval on component unmount }, []); const handleInputChange = (event) => { setSearchTopic(event.target.value); }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); // Prevent the default form submit action onSelectedQuestionChange(`&q=${searchTopic}`); }; return (
    ); }
